sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"陪同，伴随"之意
means: accompany ：既可指人也可指物。用于人时，侧重关系紧密或同时发生。
conduct ：无论用于人或物均指引导带领。
attend ：侧重主从关系，即下级对上级，学生对老师等，或表恭、服侍。
escort ：通常指用车或人在陆上伴随、护送，其目的是保护或出于礼节。

sentence.Network_en: This volume of essays was designed to accompany an exhibition in Cologne.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本文集是为配合在科隆举办的一场展览而出的。

sentence.Network_en: Barron invited her to accompany him to the races.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴伦邀请她陪他参加比赛。

sentence.Network_en: He took time out from campaigning to accompany his mother to dinner.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从竞选活动中挤出一点时间陪母亲吃饭。

英文字典_百度文库 ... accommodate 适应 accompany 陪同;伴奏 accomplish 实行;完成.
新概念英语第二册笔记(修订版)_免费素材_当知网 ... present = gift 礼物 ★accompany     v. 陪伴, 随行 ★approach     v. 走近.

list.abs: would you like me to accompany you to your room ., 你想让我陪你去你房间吗.
出版专业英语词汇 - 清扬古风的日志 - 网易博客 ... academic thesis 学术论文 accompanying diagram 附图 accordion fold 折页.
accommodation coefficient 适应系数accompanying species 伴生种accrescent 花后增大的
accompanying gas 伴生气accompanying mineral 伴生矿物accomplish 完成

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French accompagner, from a- (from Latin ad 'to, at') + compagne, from Old French compaignon 'companion'. The spelling change was due to association with company

entry.def: If you accompany someone, you go somewhere with them.

example.ex: Ken agreed to accompany me on a trip to Africa...
example.tran: 肯答应陪我一起去非洲。

example.ex: She was accompanied by her younger brother...

entry.tran: 伴随；和…一起发生（或同时存在）
entry.def: If one thing accompanies another, it happens or exists at the same time, or as a result of it.

example.ex: This volume of essays was designed to accompany an exhibition in Cologne...
example.tran: 这本文集是为配合在科隆举办的一场展览而出的。

example.ex: The proposal was instantly voted through with two to one in favour, accompanied by enthusiastic applause...
example.tran: 在热烈的掌声中，提案以2比1的优势很快通过了表决。

entry.def: If you accompany a singer or a musician, you play one part of a piece of music while they sing or play the main tune.

example.ex: He sang and Alice accompanied him on the piano...
example.tran: 他一边唱，艾丽斯一边为他钢琴伴奏。

example.ex: We ended with Blake's Jerusalem, accompanied on the organ by Herbert Wiseman.
example.tran: 在赫伯特·怀斯曼的风琴伴奏下，我们演唱了布莱克的《耶路撒冷》作为终曲。

sentences.sentence: "The nurse accompanied the old lady everywhere"
"The orchestra could barely follow the frequent pitch changes of the soprano"

auth_sentence.content: Mother had refused to accompany son to the station.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mother had refused to accompany son to the station.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mother had refused to accompany son to the station.

auth_sentence.res_content: Juan Molina, who will accompany the pope in Cuba.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Juan Molina, who will accompany the pope in Cuba.

auth_sentence.content: The young girl gave him gracious leave to accompany her.
auth_sentence.res_content: The young girl gave him gracious leave to accompany her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The young girl gave him gracious leave to accompany her.

kd.ZH: 用某种乐器给某人伴奏

Sentence.sentence: Accompany her roommate to the classroom.
Accompany Mr Gartner to the Linate airport.
More to the point, he had yet to settle on a subject for the personal essay accompanying the application.

sentences.en: May we accompany you on your walk?
sentences.cn: 我们陪你一起散步好吗?

sentences.en: He accompanied me at the guitar.

sentences.cn: 他们和谐地伴奏(或伴唱)。

jushi.english: Bill accompanied the singer on the guitar.
jushi.chinese: 比尔为那歌唱者弹吉他伴奏。

jushi.english: Let me accompany you to your hotel.
Secret service agents accompanied the President everywhere.
jushi.chinese: 特工人员处处都跟随着总统。
